original: 回復時間：$Skill_CD(2686)@在武將四周，召喚出6名虎豹騎，攻擊附近的敵人。虎豹騎屬性體力值：$Soldier_HP(1216)@武力值：$Soldier_Str(1216)@
text: Response time:  $Skill_CD(2686)@ Around the generals, 6 tiger and leopard riders were summoned to attack nearby enemies. Tiger and leopard rider attribute physical strength:  $Soldier_HP(1216)@武力值:  $Soldier_Str(1216)@
